column2: BRIEF-HCI Group Expects To Recognize Net Reinsurance Premiums Ceded Of About $175 Mln From June 1, 2020 Through May 31, 2021 June 9 (Reuters) - HCI Group Inc: * HCI GROUP INC - EXPECTS TO RECOGNIZE NET REINSURANCE PREMIUMS CEDED OF APPROXIMATELY $175 MILLION FROM JUNE 1, 2020 THROUGH MAY 31, 2021 Source text: [bit.ly/3cQNfkB] Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)

BRIEF-HCI Group Files For Mixed Shelf Offering Of Up To $150 Million May 15 (Reuters) - Hci Group Inc: * HCI GROUP FILES FOR MIXED SHELF OFFERING OF UPTO $150 MILLION - SEC FILING Source text: (bit.ly/2LJS2tn) Further company coverage:

BRIEF-HCI Group Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.07 May 7 (Reuters) - Hci Group Inc: * Q1 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.54 EXCLUDING ITEMS * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE ESTIMATE $0.77 -- REFINITIV IBES DATA * CONSOLIDATED GROSS WRITTEN PREMIUMS OF $76.5 MILLION FOR Q1 OF 2020 WERE UP 13.2% FROM $67.6 MILLION IN Q1 OF 2019 * CONSOLIDATED GROSS PREMIUMS EARNED OF $92.4 MILLION FOR Q1 OF 2020 WERE UP 11.8% FROM $82.6 MILLION IN Q1 OF 2019 * Q1 NET PREMIUMS EARNED $61.6 MILLION VERSUS $51,.2 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-HCI Group Board Authorizes $20 Million Stock Repurchase Program March 13 (Reuters) - Hci Group Inc: * HCI GROUP BOARD AUTHORIZES $20 MILLION STOCK REPURCHASE PROGRAM Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-HCI Group Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.82 March 5 (Reuters) - Hci Group Inc: * HCI GROUP REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2019 RESULTS * Q4 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.76 EXCLUDING ITEMS * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE ESTIMATE $0.85 -- REFINITIV IBES DATA * Q4 NET PREMIUMS EARNED $58.7 MILLION MILLION $52.8 MILLION * Q4 TOTAL REVENUE $63.2 MILLION VERSUS $53.0 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-HCI Group Insurance Subsidiary Enters Into Policy Replacement Agreement With Anchor Property & Casualty Insurance Company Feb 14 (Reuters) - Hci Group Inc: * HCI GROUP INSURANCE SUBSIDIARY ENTERS INTO POLICY REPLACEMENT AGREEMENT WITH ANCHOR PROPERTY & CASUALTY INSURANCE COMPANY * HCI GROUP INC - UNDER AGREEMENT WITH ANCHOR PROPERTY & CASUALTY INSURANCE COMPANY, ANCHOR WILL CANCEL ALL ITS POLICIES AS OF APRIL 1, 2020 * HCI GROUP INC - UNDER AGREEMENT, HOMEOWNERS CHOICE WILL OFFER TO ANCHOR’S POLICYHOLDERS SHORT-TERM REPLACEMENT POLICIES, FOR POLICIES CANCELLED * HCI GROUP INC - ANCHOR’S POLICYHOLDERS WILL BE UNDER NO OBLIGATION TO ACCEPT REPLACEMENT POLICIES * HCI GROUP INC - ANCHOR WILL RETAIN LIABILITY FOR POLICYHOLDER CLAIMS ARISING FROM EVENTS OCCURRING ON OR BEFORE MARCH 31, 2020 * HCI GROUP INC - UPON EXPIRATION OF REPLACEMENT POLICIES, HOMEOWNERS CHOICE WILL OFFER RENEWALS TO POLICYHOLDERS AT ITS OWN RATES AND TERMS * HCI GROUP INC - AGREEMENT CONTAINS NO PURCHASE PRICE FOR TRANSITION OF BUSINESS TO HOMEOWNERS CHOICE * HCI GROUP - AGREEMENT WITH ANCHOR INCLUDES A PAYMENT BASED ON PREMIUM IN FORCE ASSOCIATED WITH REPLACEMENT POLICES REMAINING IN FORCE AT JUNE 1 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-HCI Group Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share $1.11 May 1 (Reuters) - HCI Group Inc: * Q1 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.26 EXCLUDING ITEMS * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.06 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * QTRLY GROSS PREMIUMS EARNED TOTALED $85.8 MILLION COMPARED WITH $91.6 MILLION * QTRLY GROSS PREMIUMS WRITTEN WERE $70.1 MILLION COMPARED WITH $71.4 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-HCI Group Increases Quarterly Cash Dividend 7.1 Pct April 17 (Reuters) - HCI Group Inc: * HCI GROUP INCREASES QUARTERLY CASH DIVIDEND 7.1% TO 37.5 CENTS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
